ComicInfo.Summary:
Science Fiction Superstar William Gibson comes to comics! The U.S. political leaders of 2016 abandon the radioactive planet they’ve destroyed and harness the power of humanity’s last hope: The Splitter, a colossal machine designed to manufacture a bright new reality for them to infiltrate and corrupt.
Note: Mr. Säugling and Colonel Yermakov do not appear in the actual story but are listed and shown in the character design pages. Yermakov is also mentioned by Naomi Givens.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Tula Lotay | 1 | Sub-A | Subscription Cover A | Butch Guice (a) & Diego Rodriguez (c) | 3 | Sub-B | Subscription Cover B | Davidé Fabbri (a) & Diego Rodriguez (c) | 4 | Sub-C | Subscription Cover C | James Biggie | 5 | RE | Convention Exclusive Cover | Butch Guice (a) & Diego Rodriguez (c) | 6 | RE | Convention Exclusive Cover | None | 7-8 | 2nd | Second Printing Cover | Butch Guice | 2 |

ComicInfo.Characters: Air Commodore Gordon Tully, Captain Vince Mathews, Colonel Yermakov, Fritz, Herr Säugling, Jack Davis, Junior Henderson, Major Guadalupe Torres, Naomi Givens
